In honor of this victory, the date is celebrated from 1923 onward as \"Red Army Day\"; it is renamed Defender of the Fatherland Day after the fall of the Soviet Union in 1991, and is colloquially known as \"Men's Day\".", "1927 \u2013 President Calvin Coolidge signs a bill by Congress establishing the Federal Radio Commission (later replaced by the Federal Communications Commission) which was to regulate the use of radio frequencies in the United States.", "1927 \u2013 German theoretical physicist Werner Heisenberg writes a letter to fellow physicist Wolfgang Pauli, in which he describes his uncertainty principle for the first time.", "1934 \u2013 Leopold III becomes King of Belgium.", "1941 \u2013 Plutonium is first produced and isolated by Dr. Glenn T. The city is liberated by Soviet and Polish forces.", "1945 \u2013 World War II: The German town of Pforzheim is completely destroyed in a raid by 379 British bombers.", "1947 \u2013 The International Organization for Standardization (ISO) is founded.", "1954 \u2013 The first mass inoculation of children against polio with the Salk vaccine begins in Pittsburgh.", "1955 \u2013 First meeting of the Southeast Asia Treaty Organization (SEATO).", "1958 \u2013 Cuban rebels kidnap 5-time world driving champion Juan Manuel Fangio.", "1966 \u2013 In Syria, Baath party member Salah Jadid leads an intra-party military coup that replaces the previous government of General Amin Hafiz, also a Baathist.", "1974 \u2013 The Symbionese Liberation Army demands $4 million more to release kidnap victim Patty Hearst.", "1980 \u2013 Iranian Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ruhollah Khomeini states that Iran's parliament will decide the fate of the American embassy hostages.", "1981 \u2013 In Spain, Antonio Tejero attempts a coup d'\u00e9tat by capturing the Spanish Congress of Deputies.", "1983 \u2013 The United States Environmental Protection Agency announces its intent to buy out and evacuate the dioxin-contaminated community of Times Beach, Missouri.", "1987 \u2013 Supernova 1987a is seen in the Large Magellanic Cloud.", "1991 \u2013 Gulf War: Ground troops cross the Saudi Arabian border and enter Iraq, thus beginning the ground phase of the war.", "1991 \u2013 In Thailand, General Sunthorn Kongsompong leads a bloodless coup d'\u00e9tat, deposing Prime Minister Chatichai Choonhavan.", "1997 \u2013 A small fire occurs in the Russian Space station, Mir.", "1998 \u2013 In the United States, tornadoes in central Florida destroy or damage 2,600 structures and kill 42.", "1998 \u2013 Osama bin Laden publishes a fatwa declaring jihad against all Jews and \"Crusaders\"; the first Astronomer Royal of England.", "1681 \u2013 Charles II grants a land charter to William Penn for the area that will later become Pennsylvania.", "1776 \u2013 American Revolutionary War: The Continental Army fortifies Dorchester Heights with cannon, leading the British troops to abandon the Siege of Boston.", "1789 \u2013 In New York City, the first Congress of the United States meets, putting the United States Constitution into effect.", "1790 \u2013 France is divided into 83 d\u00e9partements, cutting across the former provinces in an attempt to dislodge regional loyalties based on ownership of land by the nobility.", "1791 \u2013 A Constitutional Act is introduced by the British House of Commons in London which envisages the separation of Canada into Lower Canada (Quebec) and Upper Canada (Ontario).", "1791 \u2013 Vermont is admitted to the U.S. as the fourteenth state.", "1794 \u2013 The 11th Amendment to the U.S. Constitution is passed by the U.S. Congress.", "1797 \u2013 In the first ever peaceful transfer of power between elected leaders in modern times, John Adams is sworn in as President of the United States, succeeding George Washington.", "1804 \u2013 Castle Hill Rebellion: Irish convicts rebel against British colonial authority in the Colony of New South Wales.", "1814 \u2013 Americans defeat the British at the Battle of Longwoods between London, Ontario and Thamesville, near present-day Wardsville, Ontario.", "1848 \u2013 Carlo Alberto di Savoia signs the Statuto Albertino that will later represent the first constitution of the Regno d'Italia", "1861 \u2013 The first national flag of the Confederate States of America (the \"Stars and Bars\") is adopted.", "1865 \u2013 The third and final national flag of the Confederate States of America is adopted by the Confederate Congress.", "1882 \u2013 Britain's first electric trams run in east London.", "1890 \u2013 The longest bridge in Great Britain, the Forth Rail Bridge in Scotland, measuring 1,710 feet (520\u00a0m) long, is opened by the Prince of Wales, who later becomes King Edward VII.", "1899 \u2013 Cyclone Mahina sweeps in north of Cooktown, Queensland, with a 12 metres (39\u00a0ft) wave that reaches up to 5 kilometres (3.1\u00a0mi) inland, killing over 300.", "1908 \u2013 The Collinwood School Fire, Collinwood near Cleveland, Ohio, kills 174 people.", "1909 \u2013 U.S. President William Taft used what became known as a Saxbe fix, a mechanism to avoid the restriction of the U.S. Constitution's Ineligibility Clause, to appoint Philander C. Knox as U.S. Secretary of State", "1913 \u2013 First Balkan War: The Greek army engages the Turks at Bizani, resulting in victory two days later.", "1917 \u2013 Jeannette Rankin of Montana becomes the first female member of the United States House of Representatives.", "1918 \u2013 The first case of Spanish flu occurs, the start of a devastating worldwide pandemic.", "1918 \u2013 The
